body_html:
@onurgu hi, I have configured CNTLM and import cert by "keytool -import -alias github.com -keystore /opt/Java/jdk/jdk1.8.0_66/jre/lib/security/cacerts -file /opt/github.com.cer -storepass changeit"
but still report ERROR:
/opt/tensorflow-b1e174e4204e0661c9060dddd8ea7513cf7f9915/tensorflow/tensorboard/bower/BUILD:5:1: no such package '@iron_a11y_announcer//': Error downloading [https://github.com/polymerelements/iron-a11y-announcer/archive/v1.0.5.tar.gz] to /root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/c747169b3f42c871e04a0528172b17cb/external/iron_a11y_announcer/v1.0.5.tar.gz: sun.security.validator.ValidatorException: PKIX path building failed: sun.security.provider.certpath.SunCertPathBuilderException: unable to find valid certification path to requested target and referenced by '//tensorflow/tensorboard/bower:bower'.
